document.masterDocTitle: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

subSubSection.paragraph: References: Vivan et al. ( 2009 ), Almeida et al. ( 2012 )

Species:
Hermundura cf. fauveli (Berkeley & Berkeley 1941 )
Note: This material needs to be revised, since
H. fauveli
was originally described from the northern hemisphere.

tr.th:
Temperini (1981) as
Loandalia americana Lana
(1984)
as
Parandalia americana

subSubSection.paragraph: Environment: Bay, sand beach, estuarine beach, tidal flat, inner continental shelf

Species:
Hermundura ocularis (Emerson & Fauchald, 1971 )
References: Almeida et al . ( 2012 ) as
Loandalia ocularis
Environment: Inner continental shelf
Note: This taxon seems to be endemic to the studied area.

Species:
Litocorsa stremma Pearson 1970
References: Rohr & Almeida ( 2006 ) Environment: Continental slope
Environment: Bay, estuarine beach, coastal lagoon, mangrove, tidal flat, salt marsh, inner continental shelf, outer

Species:
Sigambra pettiboneae Hartmann-Schröder 1979
References: Almeida et al. ( 2012 )

Museum: USNM 103016 , 103014 , 123091 , 103013 ,
103015
, IBUFRJ- 1144 Species:
Sigambra setosa Fauchald 1972
References: Souza ( 2008 )
Note: This taxon seems to be endemic to the studied area.
References: Almeida et al. ( 2012 ) Environment: Inner continental shelf Depth: 10–12 m
Note: This is a new species, yet to be described.
